phrs.translation: 步枪手, 步兵, 突击兵, 矮人火枪手
美国步枪射手, 美国步兵
机枪兵, 步兵兵种, 机枪手
切罗基线膛铳手, 却落奇线膛铳手

sentences.sentence: Send the Rifleman to protect your expansion.
sentences.translation: 派机枪兵去保护扩张点。

sentences.sentence: It is unclear whether he is the rifleman or an accomplice.
sentences.translation: 但不清楚他是枪手还是帮手。

sentences.sentence: Refinery - Sell after the Harverster comes out. Send the Rifleman to protect your expansion.
sentences.translation: 矿厂-在矿车出来后卖掉。派机枪兵去保护扩张点。
